    • Method Detail

      • LogIn

        public static SystemUser LogIn(java.lang.String userName,
                               java.lang.String password)
        User is attempting to log in. If successful, the instance of SystemUser will be returned from the database and his login status updated.
        Parameters:
        userName - User Name of the person logging in
        password - Password of the person logging in
        Returns:
        instance of SystemUser if success, or null if failed to login

      • LogOut

        public static void LogOut(java.lang.String userName)
        Instance of SystemUser is retrieved from DB, and the login status is then updated to DISCONNECTED.
        Parameters:
        userName - UserName of the person logging out

      • SearchBooks

        public static Book[] SearchBooks(boolean[] chckbx,
                                 java.lang.String[] searchString,
                                 boolean catalog)
        SystemUser is attempting to search for books.
        Parameters:
        searchString - the string input written in the search bar
        chckbx - indicates which categories were selected for search
        catalog - Whether we search in entire DB (false), or just in catalog (true)
        Returns:
        result of search

      • GetAllBooks

        public static Book[] GetAllBooks(boolean catalog)
        Get a list of all books available in the catalog
        Parameters:
        catalog - Whether we search in entire DB or only in catalog
        Returns:
        full list of books

      • SignUp

        public static boolean SignUp(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> peremeters)
        Sign-up request. if successful, a new SystemUser will be added to database
        Parameters:
        parameters - sign-up input
        Returns:
        success or failure

      • OpenAccount

        public static Customer OpenAccount(SystemUser user)
        Create a locked(=cannot purchase) Customer and replace it with given SystemUser in DB.
        Parameters:
        user - the user wanting to open an account
        Returns:
        an instance of the new Customer, or null if failure

      • ReadReviews

        public static BookReview[] ReadReviews(int bid)
        Return approved reviews for a requested book.
        Parameters:
        bid - Book ID
        Returns:
        An array of book reviews in BID

      • RefreshUser

        public static SystemUser RefreshUser(int id)
        A new SystemUser instance is returned. Used when a change is expected and user needs to be updated.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of current user
        Returns:
        up to date instance of current user
